name: Bring the Rain
description:
This game development project was created as a response to the challenge posed by the 1st Brackeys Game Jam of 2021.

The theme of the Jam was "Stronger Together", and the challenge was to create a game with this theme within one week.

In order to fit with this theme, I thought of creating a game based on the player controlling a cloud which rotates around a 2D planet in dire need of rain. There are small clouds that spawn around the planet that the player can collect. The more clouds the player collects, the more rain the cloud can produce. The clouds are stronger together.

You control a cloud and your goal is to make sure that all of the planet's sectors are nice and green. You can produce rain by collecting the small clouds that pop up around the planet.
